dcterms:description: A stroke dataset that contains 229 subjects, released in 2018 to provide a benchmark to evaluate stroke lesion segmentation methods.
dcterms:title: ATLAS v1.2

dcterms:description: A new dataset built upon ATLAS v1.2 to address concerns regarding validation and overfitting, containing 1271 T1-weighted MRIs with manually annotated lesion masks.
dcterms:title: ATLAS v2.0
